_header: Man ought to loven that rhymes ren
_description: Genesis and Exodus — 4162 lines in couplets

CamCCC444.First Lines:
Man og to luuen þat rimes renÞe wisseþ wel þe
                    logede men…
CamCCC444.Last Lines:
…And in to blisse wiþ seli menWiþ muþ and hert
                    sey we amen
